title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Health) (Designation) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (health) (designation) order

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion
heading: 2. Each body specified in the Schedule to this Order is designated for the
text_raw:
2. Each body specified in the Schedule to this Order is designated for the 
purposes of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [532] 3 

Schedule 

Children’s Health Ireland 

Dublin Dental Hospital Board 

Dental Council 

Food Safety Authority of Ireland 

Health and Social Care Professionals Council 

Health Information and Quality Authority 

Health Research Board 

Health Service Executive 

Irish Blood Transfusion Service 

Leopardstown Park Hospital Board 

Medical Council 

Mental Health Commission 

National Cancer Registry Board 

National Haemophilia Council 

National Paediatric Hospital Development Board 

National Treatment Purchase Fund Board 

Nursing and Midwifery Board of Ireland 

Pre-Hospital Emergency Care Council 

Registration Boards established by section 26 or by regulation under section 4 
of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005 

The Pharmaceutical Society of Ireland 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 November, 2020. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [532]

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020), and being of the opinion
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Instrument designates each body listed in the Schedule as a State body for 
the purposes of holding remote meetings under section 29 of the Civil Law and 
Criminal Law (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [532] 5
